feed.title: SAP Community - ABAP Development
feed.subtitle: ABAP Development Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: How to count distinct numbers from a internal table using SAP ABAP 7.5 ?
entry.content:
Hi experts,

A simple internal table like this :

COMP      ID1       ID2

1000         A1        B1

1000         A1        B2

1000         A2        B2

1000         A3        B2

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

The result I need is : 

COMP         COUNT(distinct ID1)         COUNT(distinct ID2)

1000                               3                                              2

 

How to achieve this using SAP ABAP 7.5 ?

Tks.

entry.title: In sap tm, for Freight Unit automatic creation can we generate multiple FUs with different quantity?
entry.content:
at the start we have an initial FU type when finalize Final FU type is generated.

In our current scenario 1 SO with 1 item & 60 units, during initial FU type.

When Final FU type trigger base on our custom criteria. we need to generate 3 FUs final type with different quantity.

FU 1 = 10 units, FU 2 = 30 units & FU 3 = 20 units. 

I have already an alternative approach.

I want to know if this possible for Badi and process controller only? 

we are currently applying standard strategy FUB_AUTO.

I have added a custom method after post processing in process controller

entry.title: modify dynamic field symbol
entry.content:
Row MANDT PERNR ENDDA BEGDA 
1 300 92002278 99991231
2 300 92002278 99991231 

I now need modify the date BEGDA | ENDDA an that the resulted is the following:
Row MANDT PERNR ENDDA BEGDA
1 300 92002278 20250921 20240823
2 300 92002278 99991231 20250922

Hello Experts,

I am getting issue while modifying dynamic field symbol.

I have the following program.

REPORT ZTEST.
PARAMETERS:p_table TYPE tabname.

DATA:lr_data TYPE REF TO data,
     lr_line TYPE REF TO data,
  lv_where      TYPE string VALUE 'PERNR = ''92002278'''.

FIELD-SYMBOLS:<fs_table> TYPE STANDARD TABLE,
              <fs_s>  TYPE ANY,
              <fs_line>  TYPE ANY.

CREATE DATA lr_data TYPE TABLE OF (p_table).
ASSIGN lr_data->* TO <fs_table>.
CREATE DATA lr_line LIKE LINE OF <fs_table>.
ASSIGN lr_line->* TO <fs_line>.

SELECT * FROM (p_table) INTO TABLE <fs_table> WHERE (lv_where).
APPEND  <fs_table>[ lines( <fs_table> ) ] TO <fs_table>.

s

Row MANDT PERNR ENDDA BEGDA 
1 300 92002278 99991231
2 300 92002278 99991231 

I now need modify the date BEGDA | ENDDA an that the resulted is the following:
Row MANDT PERNR ENDDA BEGDA
1 300 92002278 20250921 20240823
2 300 92002278 99991231 20250921

Regards

entry.title: Double Periods (". . ") Not Throwing Syntax Error In ABAP.
entry.content:
Hello Experts,

I am practicing ABAP and I have a small doubt regarding syntax.

In my code, I accidentally wrote:  IF sy-subrc = 0.
WRITE: 'Success'.
ENDIF..   

or at any ending statement if i give dot after the dot ( .. ), it gives me no syntax error and successfully activated the program. 

Is this expected behavior in ABAP? Why doesn’t the system flag this as an error?
Would appreciate if someone could clarify the reasoning behind this.

Thanks in advance!

entry.title: SCU3
entry.content:
I need to create a custom program to display the old and new values based on SCU3. However, I am unable to read the LOGDATA field from the DBTABLOG table. Is there a way to read the log table and display the results in an ALV report?

Thanks in advance

entry.title: No physical path is configured for logical file name IBIP_LOG_FILE
entry.content:
Hello All,

I am working on a migration project, and I have an issue with LSMW. While executing Create Batch Input Session I came across an error "No physical path is configured for logical file name IBIP_LOG_FILE". 

I have maintained the physical path in FILE transaction for both UNIX and windows NT as mentioned below

I have gone through a post where they have maintained the logical path and logical file in specify file step only as mentioned below.

But I am not able to see this step I can only see the option to provide the file name

Is this feature based on any version? Currently I am working on S4 core 108 and LSMW version  4.0.0.  Please suggest resolving this issue.

Thanks

Pallavi

Kunal.

entry.title: Security related ATC checks, nonsense of pseudo comments
entry.content:
Hi all,

I want to use ATC security checks to identify certain security vulnerables like usage of GENERATE REPORT, GENERATE SUBROUINE POOL and others. I found there are already ATC checks available for, but they can be easily suppressed by pseudo comment

"#EC CI_GENERATE.

In my opinion, it absolutely makes no sense to be able supress certain ATC checks by pseudo comments. In some cases it makes sense (like BAPI call with material length check). But for security related topics, it is dangerous in my opinion. Instead, ATC exemption should be used for this imo.

If you employ unfriendly/enemy developers (i.e., by external partner), they simply add pseudo comments to cheat on ATC check. This makes it more challenging in identifying vulnerable code as I can't trust ATC checks here.

Is there a way to overcome this issue (beside replacing developers)

entry.title: Create Z program to update EDPAR entries
entry.content:
Hello team, 

We currently update EDPAR entries using transaction VOE4 , but each time we have to ask the Basis team to open the client after approval. This process takes time. We would like to create a Z program to handle this instead.

Can anyone advise? Should we use BDC for VOE4, or is there a relevant function module available?

Thank you very much.

Daroi

entry.title: Is there an ABAP equivalent of JavaDocs for SAP classes and methods?
entry.content:
Hi all,

In Java, they have Javadocs  that provide a complete API reference for classes, listing all methods, parameters, return types, and usage examples. I’m looking for something similar in ABAP.  

Specifically, is there an official SAP documentation page that provides a Javadoc-style API reference for standard ABAP classes? i.e. the equivalent of https://docs.oracle.com/javase/8/docs/api/

entry.title: FIORI APP extensibility
entry.content:
I need to extend a standard Fiori application with a custom field. Normally, the recommended approach would be to use the Custom Fields and Logic app, which automatically creates a new field (with the ZZ1_ prefix) in the relevant table and exposes it to Fiori.

However, in my case, the situation is different:

The customer has already added a custom field ZCLASS in table MARD using an append structure and this field is already in use across multiple forms, reports (so it’s business critical)

If I use the Custom Fields and Logic app now, it will create a new field ZZ1_CLASS in MARD, which would lead to redundant fields for the same purpose.

My question is what is the correct approach to resolve this issue?

Thank you In advance

entry.title: How to delete Local ($TMP) objects from PRD.
entry.content:
During a recent ECC-to-S4 build, many Local objects were somehow migrated to our PRD environment. They should not exist there and I need to delete them.

I saw a post suggesting the use of program SEO_REMOVE_FROM_TADIR, but that program appears to only affect types CLAS and INTF.

Since transports are not assigned to $TMP objects, I can't use a transport landscape to delete them via the DEV-QAS-PRD route.

Any suggestions?

Thanks, Leo

entry.title: Incident with FM SD_VBPA_READ_WITH_VBELN in S4HANA
entry.content:
Good afternoon,

We have an incident with the FM SD_VBPA_READ_WITH_VBELN.

We use it in a Client Transaction that creates a delivery and in S4/HANA does not work. That is because of this form, VBPA_BP_AND_ADDRTYPE_GET.

 

These are the details of the code:

S4HANA (lines 95-107)

SELECT * FROM VBPA INTO TABLE LB_VBPAVB
                     WHERE VBELN = I_VBELN
                     ORDER BY PRIMARY KEY.
  IF SY-SUBRC EQ 0.
    PERFORM VBPA_BP_AND_ADDRTYPE_GET
        TABLES LB_VBPAVB.
    IF VBPA_LINES EQ 0.
      VBPA_LINES = SY-DBCNT.
      BF_VBPAVB[] = LB_VBPAVB[].
    ELSE.
      VBPA_LINES = VBPA_LINES + SY-DBCNT.
      INSERT LINES OF LB_VBPAVB INTO BF_VBPAVB INDEX BF_TABIX.
    ENDIF.

 

ECC (lines 95-105)

SELECT * FROM VBPA INTO TABLE LB_VBPAVB
                     WHERE VBELN = I_VBELN
                     ORDER BY PRIMARY KEY.
  IF SY-SUBRC EQ 0.
    IF VBPA_LINES EQ 0.
      VBPA_LINES = SY-DBCNT.
      BF_VBPAVB[] = LB_VBPAVB[].
    ELSE.
      VBPA_LINES = VBPA_LINES + SY-DBCNT.
      INSERT LINES OF LB_VBPAVB INTO BF_VBPAVB INDEX BF_TABIX.
    ENDIF.

 

This form appears in the new system and reset the value of SY-DBCNT. Then, the delivery is not create.

 

The only way to force it to work is having an item in KNVK with the code of the partner. We do not create this codes as a Contact Partner and if we would start to do it we need to change all of our processes involve.

Do you know how to handle this? Have anyone this problem?

Thanks in advance

Kind regards

entry.title: How to handle RV61Axx price condition rules these days?
entry.content:
Hi all,

as part of our clean core journey, we try to get rid of as many modifications as possible. One of the most modified module is SD and especially all these RV61Axx reports. These are price condition rules, you know. In case we need a new rule (and we use hundrets), we always need to modify the system.

To my knowledge, modifications are not allowed in public cloud scenario. But SAP customers will still need to use price condition rules. So what is the alternative in public cloud and are we able to use them in our S/4 HANA 2023 FP1 on-premise system as well?

entry.title: Custom Include inside EXIT_SAPLCJWB_004 returns an error statement "Statement not accessible
entry.content:
I have created an include ZXCN1U21 inside EXIT_SAPLCJWB_004 and tried to put a statement BREAK-POINT for testing purposes. 

However, upon trying to activate it, it returns an error "Statement not accessible". How do I address this kind of error?

entry.title: Need Badi/user exit-migo-update batch classification
entry.content:
Hello,

I'm looking for a user exit/BADI/enhancement in MIGO that would allow me to update the classifications for a material after entering the Batch/Vendor Batch or when saving the document (provided there are no existing classifications).

To be more precise:

1. Launch MIGO and enter a Purchase Order
2. Then, for the selected line, go to the Batch tab
3. Enter a Batch number, and by pressing Enter, you populate the classifications for Material/Batch without clicking the "Classification" button
4. If step 3 is not possible, populate the classifications for Material/Batch when saving the document

Thank you for your help

entry.title: Business Area in S_ALR_87012082 report
entry.content: Is there any possible way to add Business Area in S_ALR_87012082 standard report in ECC?

entry.title: When using xco libraries I obtain the error message "PUT operation failed"
entry.content:
When developing a helper class to solve a customer problem I used the xco libraries to generate several packages.  

The creation of the packages initially failed and in the try catch block I only received the error message 

"PUT operation failed"

TRY.
        DATA(lo_specification) = put_operation->add_object( i_package_name )->create_form_specification( ).
        lo_specification->set_short_description( short_description ).
        lo_specification->properties->set_super_package( i_super_package_name )->set_software_component( co_dmo_sap_package ).
        DATA(lo_result) = put_operation->execute( ).
        " handle findings
        DATA(lo_findings) = lo_result->findings.
        findings = lo_findings->get( ).
      CATCH cx_root  INTO DATA(generation_exception).
        exception_text = generation_exception->get_text(  ).
ENDTRY.

 So how I am able to find out the root cause?

entry.title: CDS View - Casting to Data Element but Field Name is Missing in SE16N
entry.content:
Hello,
I have a field named "birim_fiyat" in my view:

@Semantics.amount.currencyCode: 'waers'
cast(
  cast(
    case when rseg.menge <> 0 then cast(rseg.wrbtr as abap.dec(11,2)) / cast(rseg.menge as abap.dec(11,2)) else 0 end
  as abap.dec(11,4))
as zfi_e_birim_fiyat) as birim_fiyat

Everything works fine except the column name is missing in SE16N. I see the column name in the select parameters:

But it's blank when I run it:

Any help is appreciated
Volkan
